title: Jo Stevens – 2020 Comments on People Refusing Vaccine
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the comments made by Jo Stevens, the Shadow Digital, Culture, Media and Sport Secretary, on 7 July 2020.

This poll lays bare just how dangerous disinformation online can be.
